trans-unit.source: Represents a configuration element that defines authentication settings for the HTTP transport.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个配置元素，定义 HTTP 传输的身份验证设置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpTransportSecurityElement"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the credential used to authenticate the client to the service.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于服务客户端身份验证的凭据。

trans-unit.source: A valid <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType> value that specifies the credential used to authenticate the client to the service.
trans-unit.target: 一个有效<xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType>值，该值指定用于对服务客户端身份验证的凭据。</xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType>

trans-unit.source: Get a <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement"></xref> instance which contains the configuration settings to use for extended protection for a session.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement"></xref>实例，其中包含的配置设置要用于扩展用于会话的保护。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the credential used to authenticate the client to a domain proxy.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于向域代理客户端身份验证的凭据。

trans-unit.source: A valid <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpProxyCredentialType"></xref> value that specifies the credential used to authenticate the client to a domain proxy.
trans-unit.target: 一个有效<xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpProxyCredentialType"></xref>值，该值指定用于向域代理客户端身份验证的凭据。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that specifies the authentication realm for digest or basic authentication.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个字符串，指定摘要式或基本身份验证的身份验证领域。

trans-unit.source: An authentication realm specifies at least the name of the host that performs the authentication.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证领域至少指定执行身份验证的主机的名称。

trans-unit.source: It can also specify a collection of users that has access.
trans-unit.target: 它还可以指定具有访问权限的用户集合。

trans-unit.source: A user can query the authentication realm to understand which one of the several possible usernames and passwords can be used.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以查询身份验证领域，以了解多个可能的用户名和密码中哪一个可以使用。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the authentication realm for digest or basic authentication.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，指定摘要式或基本身份验证的身份验证领域。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为一个空字符串。
